hammer.running.message: :rocket:  Hammer is up and running on port {{port}}

port.in.use.message: Port: {{port}} is in use and cannot be listened to

no.plugin.configuration.message: There is no plugin configuration file found: {{configFile}} in the folder: {{folder}}

no.plugin.name.message: There is no plugin name defined in {{config}}

no.plugin.main.file.message: There is no main plugin file defined or the file does not exists in the following config:

plugin.no.compatible.hammer.version.defi.message: There is no compatible hammer version defined in the following config {{config}}

plugin.name.already.in.use.message: The plugin name: {{name}} is already in use

plugin.folder.does.not.exists.or.message: The given plugin path {{path}} does not exists or path is not a directory

plugin.config.not.json.message: The config file {{configFile}} does not contain JSON

plugin.is.not.class.message: The plugin: {{plugin}} does not export a class function

plugin.not.compatible.with.current.hamme.message: The plugin: {{name}} is not compatible with this version of hammer. {{name}} is compatible with the following verion: {{version}}
